coffee.name: Coffee
coffee.description: It is served by mixing coffee and hot/iced water. Start and end your day with coffee. If you would like it sweeter, please tell the staff.

coffee.name: Americano
coffee.description: It is served by mixing espresso and hot/iced water. If you have a busy day, how about taking a break while drinking an Americano?

coffee.name: Latte
coffee.description: It is served by mixing espresso and steamed/iced milk with sugar. Enjoy the day calmly with a latte.

coffee.name: Mocha
coffee.description: It is served by mixing espresso, chocolate and steamed/iced milk. Enjoy the sweetness of espresso and chocolate.

coffee.name: Espresso
coffee.description: It is served by mixing solo espresso and a small cup of hot/iced water. Enjoy the bitter taste of traditional espresso.

coffee.name: Cappuccino
coffee.description: It is served by mixing espresso and steamed/iced milk with sugar. The soft foam of the cappuccino will calm your mind.

tea.name: GreenTea
tea.description: It is served by mixing GreenTea and steamed/iced milk. This is the drink most ordered by customers. It's a choice you won't regret.

tea.name: MilkTea
tea.description: It is served by mixing black tea and hot/iced water. If your day is boring, drink milk tea to solve your problems. If you would like it sweeter, please tell the staff.

tea.name: Iced Mango
tea.description: It is served by mixing fresh mango and iced water. Do you like sour taste? Then you have chosen well.

tea.name: Iced Peach
tea.description: It is served by mixing fresh peach and iced water. Feel the unique aroma and taste that only peaches can produce.

tea.name: Iced Orange
tea.description: It is served by mixing fresh orange and iced water. A sour orange is always right. We recommend it to anyone who likes sour taste.

smoothie.name: Chocolate
smoothie.description: It is served by mixing sweet chocolate and iced milk. Enjoy the sweetness of chocolate. Don't worry, it's moderately sweet.

smoothie.name: Strawberry
smoothie.description: It is served by mixing fresh strawberry and iced water. Are you looking for something refreshing and sweet? We have a strawberry smoothie.

smoothie.name: Pistachio
smoothie.description: It is served by mixing chopped nuts and iced milk. We cut it into small pieces and made our own powder, so you can taste the good quality.

smoothie.name: GreenTea
smoothie.description: It is served by mixing green tea and iced milk. Green tea smoothie loved by our customers the most.

smoothie.name: Green Apple
smoothie.description: It is served by mixing green apple and iced. If you want a fresh and new feeling, choose this drink.

smoothie.name: Taro
smoothie.description: It is served by mixing taro and iced milk. You haven't tried tarot yet? Taro can be called the origin of smoothies. Try it today.

smoothie.name: Mango
smoothie.description: It is served by mixing fresh mango and iced water. Mango won't make you regret it. Make wise choices.

smoothie.name: Kiwi
smoothie.description: It is served by mixing fresh kiwi and iced water. Isn't kiwi the representative of sour taste among fruits? Recommended for those who like sour taste.

smoothie.name: Blueberry
smoothie.description: It is served by mixing fresh blueberry and iced water. We grind our own blueberries instead of powder to ensure better aroma and taste.

smoothie.name: Watermelon
smoothie.description: It is served by mixing fresh watermelon and iced water. How about a refreshing day with watermelon? Spend the day with a moderate sweetness and refreshing taste.
